protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
description: Reference:  Fuhrman et al, 1988. Extraction from Natural Planktonic Microorganisms of DNA Suitable for Molecular Biological Studies. AEM 54(6), 1426‐1429
guidelines:
modified by Rohan Sachdeva, 08132010; Cheryl Chow 03092011

Supplies:
 a) Dry ice
b) 15 ml falcon tube – 1 per filter
c) Oak Ridge tube – 1 per filter; Nalgene #3119-ÃÂÃÂ0050 (polypropylene)  
d) 2 x 2ml NON lo-ÃÂÃÂbind tube/filter for 1st and 2nd DNA precipitation steps (Day 2 steps 4, 14)
e) 2 x 1.5ml loâÃÂÃÂbind tube/filter (Day 3, step 6)
f) 1 x PCR tube/filter for 2ng/μl dilution
g) pH paper, range 5.5âÃÂÃÂ9

Reagents:   Make all solutions with autoclaved 0.02µm filtered MilliQ water and autoclave.
a) 10X STE: 100mM Tris-Cl (pHâÃÂÃÂ8.0), 1M NaCl, and 10mM EDTA). Dilute to 1X STE. 
b) 10% SDS: do NOT autoclave.
c) 10.5M NH4OAC
d) 100% Ethanol (200 proof, molecular grade)
e) 1X TE, pH 8.0: 10mM Tris-ÃÂÃÂCl (pH 8.0) and 1mM EDTA
f) Phenol, pH 8
g) SEVAG aka chloroform: isoamyl alcohol
h) Phenol: chloroform: isoamyl alcohol, pH 8 (optional)

Day 1 Note: **Process in sets of 4 samples through step #9 and spin all together.

Reference:  Fuhrman et al, 1988. Extraction from Natural Planktonic Microorganisms of DNA Suitable for Molecular Biological Studies. AEM 54(6), 1426-ÃÂÃÂ1429

components.data: Prepare a boiling water bath; this MUST be a rolling boil.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare a boiling water bath; this MUST be a rolling boil.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 1 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 1 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

components.data: Place 50ml falcon tube with 142mm filter on dry ice.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place 50ml falcon tube with 142mm filter on dry ice.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

components.data: Using the bottom of an untouched STERILE 15ml polypropylene falcon tube as a pestle, vigorously crush the 142mm filter while in the 50ml falcon until it has been pulverized and the filter material is BELOW the 10ml line.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Using the bottom of an untouched STERILE 15ml polypropylene falcon tube as a pestle, vigorously crush the 142mm filter while in the 50ml falcon until it has been pulverized and the filter material is BELOW the 10ml line.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 3 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

components.data: Add 9mls of 1X STE directly to the crushed filter pieces.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 9mls of 1X STE directly to the crushed filter pieces.
Vortex for 10 seconds.

components.data: Add 1ml of 10% SDS drop‐wise while swirling.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1ml of 10% SDS drop‐wise while swirling.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 6 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

components.data: Spin briefly in Eppendorf 5810R centrifuge at 15‐25ºC by spinning up to 4000 rpm (3220xg) and immediately stopping.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin briefly in Eppendorf 5810R centrifuge at 15‐25ºC by spinning up to 4000 rpm (3220xg) and immediately stopping.

components.data: Place in rolling, boiling water bath for 2 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place in rolling, boiling water bath for 2 minutes.

components.data: Spin at 4000 rpm (Eppendorf 5810R) for 10 minutes at 15ºC to separate filter and debris.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 4000 rpm (Eppendorf 5810R) for 10 minutes at 15ºC to separate filter and debris.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 9 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

components.data: Add 3mls of 10.5M NH4OAC to an Oak Ridge tube for each filter.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 3mls of 10.5M NH4OAC to an Oak Ridge tube for each filter.

components.data: Pour supernatant (only) from 50ml falcon tube into Oak Ridge tube (38ml capacity).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pour supernatant (only) from 50ml falcon tube into Oak Ridge tube (38ml capacity).

components.data: Use 1ml pipette to transfer any remaining supernatant to Oak Ridge tube: ~0.5‐1ml.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Use 1ml pipette to transfer any remaining supernatant to Oak Ridge tube: ~0.5‐1ml.

components.data: Remove any large filter pieces using STERILE 1ml serological pipette to reach the bottom and drag the filter pieces up the sides.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove any large filter pieces using STERILE 1ml serological pipette to reach the bottom and drag the filter pieces up the sides.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 13 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.annotation: (or with wide bore plastic pipette tip)
source_data.thread_text: (or with wide bore plastic pipette tip)
source_data.body: (or with wide bore plastic pipette tip)

source_data.description: Add 28mls of 200 proof (100%) EtOH (molecular grade).
Invert to mix thoroughly.
Store at ‐20°C overnight.

components.data: Pellet DNA in Sorvall RC5‐B at 4ºC using the HB‐4 rotor by spinning at max speed of 13,000RPM (27,900xg) for at least 2 hours.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pellet DNA in Sorvall RC5‐B at 4ºC using the HB‐4 rotor by spinning at max speed of 13,000RPM (27,900xg) for at least 2 hours.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 17 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 17 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

components.data: Gently pour out supernatant and dry pellet upside‐down in fume hood for at least 2 hours.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Gently pour out supernatant and dry pellet upside‐down in fume hood for at least 2 hours.

components.data: Resuspend in 500ul 1X TE (pH 8.0) for 2 hours at 37ºC.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend in 500ul 1X TE (pH 8.0) for 2 hours at 37ºC.
Transfer to 2ml non‐LoBind tube.
Add 500µl phenol.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 21 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 21 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

source_data.description: Mix 5 times by gentle inversion.

components.data: Spin 2 min at 12000 rpm (13,000xg) to separate organic and inorganic phases (Beckman, beige)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin 2 min at 12000 rpm (13,000xg) to separate organic and inorganic phases (Beckman, beige)

components.data: Remove and discard bottom (phenol) layer. LEAVE INTERFACE.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove and discard bottom (phenol) layer. LEAVE INTERFACE.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 24 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

components.data: Add 300µl phenol and 300µl SEVAG (CHCl3:IsoamylOH 24:1 v/v) to aqueous phase.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 300µl phenol and 300µl SEVAG (CHCl3:IsoamylOH 24:1 v/v) to aqueous phase.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 25 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

source_data.description: Mix by gentle inversion 5 times.
Spin 2 min at 12000 rpm (13,000xg).

components.data: Remove and discard bottom layer. LEAVE INTERFACE.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove and discard bottom layer. LEAVE INTERFACE.
Add 500µl SEVAG (CHCl3:IsoamylOH 24:1 v/v).
Mix by gentle inversion.
Spin 2 min at 12000 rpm (13,000xg).

components.data: Remove TOP layer (YOUR DNA) and transfer to new 2ml non‐LoBind tube. LEAVE INTERFACE BEHIND. This top layer is your DNA!!!
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove TOP layer (YOUR DNA) and transfer to new 2ml non‐LoBind tube. LEAVE INTERFACE BEHIND. This top layer is your DNA!!!

components.data: Add 125µl 10.5M NH4OAC. Mix by inversion 5‐10 times.*
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 125µl 10.5M NH4OAC. Mix by inversion 5‐10 times.*

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 33 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.annotation: *You want to add 0.25 volumes of 10.5M NH<sub>4</sub>OAc and 2.2 volumes Ethanol for a final concentration of 2.5M NH<sub>4</sub>OAc and 70% Ethanol. We assume that extract volume is 500µl. If your volume differs, adjust amounts of NH<sub>4</sub>OAc and ethanol accordingly. For 500ul: 25µl NH<sub>4</sub>OAc: 0.25 x 500 = 125µl. 1375µl EtoH: 2.2 (500+125) = 1375µl
source_data.thread_text: *You want to add 0.25 volumes of 10.5M NH<sub>4</sub>OAc and 2.2 volumes Ethanol for a final concentration of 2.5M NH<sub>4</sub>OAc and 70% Ethanol. We assume that extract volume is 500µl. If your volume differs, adjust amounts of NH<sub>4</sub>OAc and ethanol accordingly. For 500ul: 25µl NH<sub>4</sub>OAc: 0.25 x 500 = 125µl. 1375µl EtoH: 2.2 (500+125) = 1375µl
source_data.body: *You want to add 0.25 volumes of 10.5M NH<sub>4</sub>OAc and 2.2 volumes Ethanol for a final concentration of 2.5M NH<sub>4</sub>OAc and 70% Ethanol. We assume that extract volume is 500µl. If your volume differs, adjust amounts of NH<sub>4</sub>OAc and ethanol accordingly. For 500ul: 25µl NH<sub>4</sub>OAc: 0.25 x 500 = 125µl. 1375µl EtoH: 2.2 (500+125) = 1375µl

components.data: Add 1375 µl ice‐cold 100% EtOH (200 proof, molecular grade).*
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1375 µl ice‐cold 100% EtOH (200 proof, molecular grade).*

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 34 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

We assume that extract volume is 500µl. If your volume differs, adjust amounts of NH<sub>4</sub>OAc and ethanol accordingly. For 500ul: 25µl NH<sub>4</sub>OAc: 0.25 x 500 = 125µl. 1375µl EtoH: 2.2 (500+125) = 1375µl

We assume that extract volume is 500µl. If your volume differs, adjust amounts of NH<sub>4</sub>OAc and ethanol accordingly. For 500ul: 25µl NH<sub>4</sub>OAc: 0.25 x 500 = 125µl. 1375µl EtoH: 2.2 (500+125) = 1375µl

source_data.description: Mix by inversion 5‐10 times.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 35 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

source_data.description: Precipitate overnight at ‐20ºC.

components.data: Spin at max speed (approximately 13,750RPM, 12,535xg) in Beckman Microfuge E with horizontal rotor at 4ºC (cold room) for 30 minutes to pellet most DNA in the center/bottom of tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at max speed (approximately 13,750RPM, 12,535xg) in Beckman Microfuge E with horizontal rotor at 4ºC (cold room) for 30 minutes to pellet most DNA in the center/bottom of tube.

components.data: To pellet the rest of the DNA, spin the same tube for at least 90 minutes at 14,000 rpm (20,800xg) at 4ºC (Eppendorf 5810R) .
components.name: Description

source_data.description: To pellet the rest of the DNA, spin the same tube for at least 90 minutes at 14,000 rpm (20,800xg) at 4ºC (Eppendorf 5810R) .
Gently pour off supernatant.

components.data: Dry pellet for at least 2 hrs by leaving open and upside‐down.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dry pellet for at least 2 hrs by leaving open and upside‐down.

components.data: Resuspend 5m and CMAX samples in 50µl of 1X TE and 150m, 500m, and 890m samples in 30ul 1X TE for 2 hours at 37ºC.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend 5m and CMAX samples in 50µl of 1X TE and 150m, 500m, and 890m samples in 30ul 1X TE for 2 hours at 37ºC.

components.data: Transfer all re‐suspended extract to 1.5ml Eppendorf LoBind DNA tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer all re‐suspended extract to 1.5ml Eppendorf LoBind DNA tube.

components.data: Aliquot 10µl of extract to an additional 1.5ml Eppendorf LoBind DNA tube for archiving.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Aliquot 10µl of extract to an additional 1.5ml Eppendorf LoBind DNA tube for archiving.

components.data: After re‐suspension, immediately quantify using PICO Green (Invitrogen).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After re‐suspension, immediately quantify using PICO Green (Invitrogen).

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 44 of SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters

components.data: Prepare 2ng/µl dilution for a working stock using no more than 1µl of extract.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare 2ng/µl dilution for a working stock using no more than 1µl of extract.

components.data: Store dilution, extract, and archive at ‐80ºC
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Store dilution, extract, and archive at ‐80ºC

source_data.protocol_name: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
source_data.protocol_name_html: SPOT DNA Extraction from 142mm Durapore 0.22µm Filters
